availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Bracken County, Kentucky, carpenter. New York, native. Married Nancy Cummins Agrue. Father of James A. Agrue, Malinda J. Agrue, Charles B. Agrue, and Emily A. Agrue. Carpenter in Bracken County in 1850.

bibl.p: Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Bracken County, Unnamed District; Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Pendleton County, Precinct No. 3, p. 11; Find A Grave, "Henry Wheeler Agrue (1817 - 1889)," Memorial #107968143, https://www.findagrave.com/cgi-bin/fg.cgi?page=gr&GRid=107968143 (accessed October 17, 2017).
